name: I Have No Mouth and I Must Dream
name_original: I Have No Mouth and I Must Dream
description:
!!!NOW SUPPORTING MOUSE CONTROLS TOO FOR THOSE THE VR REVOLUTION HAS LEFT BEHIND!!!

The scene opens on just another day in the park. All around you are a series of innocuous events to look at - a bearded man stretching, shirtless, a cute puppy, a loving couple, a minor car accident, a failed pick-up attempt. Whatever your gaze lingers on longest, you will dream about! What follows is a series of increasingly surreal scenes based around distortions of the things you witnessed in the park. The loving couple ends up becoming your parents in a series of bizarre vignettes where you, as the camera, are a baby. The shirtless man sweeps you off your feet and beds you. If dreams are the gateway to the soul, prepare to be LAID BARE.

We got the prompt:

"A game where you have to do specific things during the day to have the coolest dream or nightmare at night."

So we took it as an excuse to film a bunch of increasingly surreal dream sequences! Bust out your Oculus Rift headset and STRAP IN! (Now supporting regular mouse control too!!!)
